title: Design Portfolio Plan
content:
## Portfolio Revamp Plan

### Tools
- Figma for design and prototyping
- Adobe Creative Suite for production
- Procreate for illustrations
- Notion for project management
- Arc browser for research

### Portfolio Structure
1. Hero section with bold statement
2. Case studies (8-10 projects, show process)
3. Personal work section (vinyl covers, vintage posters)
4. About page (eclectic/bohemian vibe)
5. Contact section

### Projects to Feature
- Brand identity for Austin coffee shop
- Music festival poster series
- Vinyl record cover redesigns
- Sustainable fashion brand assets
- Mobile app UI for plant care

### Style Direction
Eclectic, vintage-inspired, bold typography.
Reflect my love for vinyl, plants, and Austin culture.

### Work Style
Remote, coffee shop warrior. Freelance graphic designer.

title: Vinyl Collection Log
content:
## Vinyl Collection - 200+ Records

### Genres
- Indie rock
- Shoegaze (My Bloody Valentine, Slowdive)
- Latin alternative (Cafe Tacvba, Natalia Lafourcade)
- Techno (Aphex Twin, Burial)

### Recent Additions
- Slowdive - "Souvlaki" (original pressing!)
- Japanese Breakfast - "Jubilee"
- Khruangbin - "Mordechai"
- Rosalia - "El Mal Querer"

### Organization System
Genre-based, then alphabetical within genres.
Stored in Kallax shelves (room divider in studio apartment).
Turntable: Audio-Technica LP120XUSB.

### Wish List
- Cocteau Twins - "Heaven or Las Vegas"
- Deafheaven - "Sunbather" (pink vinyl)
- Boards of Canada - "Music Has the Right to Children"

### Listening: Spotify Premium for discovery, vinyl for deep listening.
### Shopping: Depop, Discogs, Austin record shops

title: Plant Care Schedule
content:
## Houseplant Care - 15+ Plants

### Living in studio apartment in Austin, TX

### Plant Inventory
| Plant | Location | Water | Light |
|-------|----------|-------|-------|
| Pothos (3) | Hanging planters | Weekly | Indirect |
| Snake plant (2) | Bookshelf | Every 2-3 weeks | Low |
| Fiddle leaf fig | Window | Weekly | Bright indirect |
| Monstera | Corner | Weekly | Bright indirect |
| Succulents (5) | Windowsill | Every 2 weeks | Direct |
| Spider plant | Hanging | Weekly | Indirect |
| Calathea | Shelf | 2x week | Indirect |

### Pet Safety (cat: Pixel)
- TOXIC to cats: pothos, snake plant -- keep in hanging planters!
- Safe: spider plant, calathea, succulents
- Cat grass planter for Pixel to nibble

### Notes
Austin heat = more frequent watering in summer.
Fertilize monthly spring through fall.
Wall-mounted planters to save floor space.

title: Austin Food Guide
content:
## Best Austin Food - Pescatarian Guide

### Diet: Pescatarian
### Allergy: Tree nuts (always ask!)

### Food Trucks (Favorites)
- Chi'Lantro: Korean-Tex-Mex fusion (skip nut toppings)
- Veracruz All Natural: migas tacos with shrimp
- Dee Dee Thai: nut-allergy friendly
- Taste of Ethiopia: lentil stew on East Riverside

### Restaurants
- Uchi: incredible Japanese (omakase!)
- Ramen Tatsu-Ya: best ramen in Austin
- Nixta Taqueria: handmade tortillas
- Lenoir: farm-to-table, hot weather menu

### Delivery Apps
- DoorDash (most food trucks available)
- Grubhub (for Chi'Lantro and Veracruz)

### Coffee
Cold brew, black. Favorite shops:
- Fleet Coffee on E 5th
- Houndstooth Coffee
- Merit Coffee

### Cuisines: Korean, Tex-Mex, Vietnamese, Ethiopian

title: Vintage Shopping Spots
content:
## Vintage & Thrift Shopping Guide

### My Sizes
- Waist: 30, Inseam: 30
- Shirt: S (EU 46-48)
- Shoe: 9 (EU 42)

### Austin Spots
- South Congress vintage shops
- East Side thrift stores
- Treasure City Thrift

### Online
- Depop (saved searches for my sizes)
- ThriftUp
- Etsy (independent designers)
- Urban Outfitters (sale only)

### Berlin Trip Spots
- Humana (multiple locations)
- Mauerpark Sunday flea market
- Garage (pay by weight!)
- Made in Berlin

### Budget
- $25-75 per find
- Budget-conscious shopping
- Support sustainable fashion

### Favorite Brands
Dr. Martens, vintage Levi's, vintage band tees.
Style: vintage/thrift, eclectic/bohemian.

title: Festival Calendar 2024
content:
## Festival & Events Calendar 2024

### Confirmed
- **SXSW** (March) - Austin, free showcases
- **ACL Fest** (October) - Austin, 3-day pass
- **Levitation** (November) - Austin psych fest

### Hoping to Attend
- Primavera Sound - Barcelona or Buenos Aires
- Desert Daze - California
- Day for Night - Houston

### Packing List (Carry-On Only)
- 2 vintage band tees
- Shorts + one light layer
- Dr. Martens or comfortable sneakers
- Portable charger
- Earplugs (protect hearing for shoegaze!)
- Small crossbody bag

### Travel
- Fly Southwest or Spirit (budget)
- Stay at hostels or Airbnb
- Budget: minimal

### Music Preferences
Indie, shoegaze, Latin alternative, techno.
Spotify Premium for pre-festival playlist building.

title: Recipe Experiments
content:
## Cooking Experiments - Pescatarian

### Diet: Pescatarian
### Allergy: Tree nuts
### Cooking frequency: 2-3x per week, experimenting

### Successful Recipes
1. **Gochujang Salmon Bowl** - Korean inspired
   - Salmon, rice, pickled veg, gochujang glaze
   - Nut-free, 25 min

2. **Shrimp Pho** - Vietnamese
   - Homemade broth, rice noodles, shrimp
   - No nut sauces, 40 min

3. **Fish Tacos** - Tex-Mex
   - Mango salsa, cabbage slaw, chipotle crema
   - 15 min weeknight go-to

4. **Misir Wot** - Ethiopian
   - Red lentil stew, naturally nut-free
   - Batch cook and freeze

### Meal Prep
- Sunday: cook lentil stew, prep rice, pickle vegetables
- Reduces DoorDash/Grubhub orders

### Delivery when lazy: DoorDash, Grubhub

title: Cycling Routes Austin
content:
## Austin Cycling Routes

### Fitness Goals: Flexibility and fun
Activities: skateboarding, cycling, yoga (3x/week total)
App: Nike Training Club

### Favorite Routes
1. **Lady Bird Lake Trail** - 10 miles, flat, scenic
2. **Veloway** - 3.1 mile loop, bike-only, speed work
3. **Barton Creek Greenbelt** - Technical mountain biking
4. **Shoal Creek Trail** - North Austin to downtown
5. **Pfluger Bridge** - Beautiful connector route

### Weekend Adventures
- Lake Travis loop (35 miles)
- Ride to Dripping Springs
- Hill Country exploration

### Bike Shops
- Mellow Johnny's (downtown)
- Bicycle Sport Shop (South Lamar)
- The Peddler (vintage bikes -- my vibe!)

### Gear
- Need a tune-up soon
- Looking for a vintage road bike

title: Side Project Ideas
content:
## Side Project Ideas

### 1. Vinyl Cover Redesign Series
- Redesign classic album covers in my style
- Post on Dribbble and Instagram
- Could become a print series on Etsy

### 2. Austin Food Truck Map
- Interactive map of Austin food trucks
- Filter by cuisine and dietary needs
- Pescatarian and allergy-friendly filters
- Build in Figma, develop with simple web stack

### 3. Sustainable Fashion Newsletter
- Curate vintage finds weekly
- Tips for thrift shopping
- Depop and Etsy highlights
- Monetize with affiliate links

### 4. Plant Care App
- Track watering schedules
- Pet toxicity warnings
- Photo progress journal
- Design in Figma, prototype in Procreate

### Tools: Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Procreate, Notion
Budget: minimal (side projects are passion-driven)

title: Monthly Budget Tracker
content:
## Monthly Budget - Freelance Designer

### Income: Variable (freelance)
### Style: Budget-conscious

### Fixed Costs
- Studio apartment rent (Austin)
- Figma subscription
- Adobe Creative Suite
- Spotify Premium
- YouTube Premium
- Google Home Mini (one-time)

### Variable
- Groceries: $250/mo (pescatarian, cook 2-3x/week)
- DoorDash/Grubhub: $100/mo (trying to reduce)
- Coffee shops (work): $80/mo (cold brew, black)
- Vintage shopping: $50-100/mo (Depop, thrift)
- Vinyl records: $30-50/mo
- Plant supplies: $20/mo

### Savings Goals
- Berlin trip fund
- New vintage road bike
- Festival season budget

### Notes
Use Etsy sales to fund vinyl habit.
Budget $25-75 for gifts (friends/family).
